summary: A sterile man arranges for his disapproving wife to receive artificial insemination, after which she starts nourishing a strong desire for the child's biological father.
cast: Mariko Okada|Isao Kimura|Mayumi Ogawa|Takeshi Kusaka|Kazuo Kitamura|Toshiyuki Hosokawa|Misao Hayase|Sachiko Matsushita|Kikuo Kaneuchi|Kyôko Seki|Tooru Ishikawa|Aoi Nakajima|Midori Tamai|Kazuko Kui|Izuru Ogawa|Yukio Kubota
title: Honô to onna
